document.full_text: north korea fired a short-range missile into waters off its west coast last week in what was likely a test of modifications to its arsenal, south korea's yonhap news agency quoted an intelligence source as saying on wednesday.
document.title: n.korea test fired short-range missile last week: yonhap
lines_and_colors: north korea fired a short-range missile into waters off its west coast last week in what was likely a test of modifications to its arsenal, south korea's yonhap news agency quoted an intelligence source as saying on wednesday.
